duties_responsibilities.duty: Hauling Machinery, Coils, Pipe, Lumber, Rebar, and over dimension loads using a flatbed trailer.
Ensuring timely delivery and safe handling of freight while adhering to safety regulations.
Handling detention, breakdown, tarp, layover, and over dimension pay.
Operating a Peterbilt 579 automatic transmission tractor and lightweight all-aluminum frame flatbed trailer.
Completing orientation, including transportation, meals, and lodging, and being dispatched with a load after orientation.

education_certification.credential: 1-year flatbed experience in the last 3 years, 6 months flatbed in 3 years, or 12 months OTR including 3 months flatbed
